title: Microsoft drops AI sales targets in half after salespeople miss their quotas
description: Report: Microsoft declared "the era of AI agents" in May, but enterprise customers aren't buying.
content: Report: Microsoft declared "the era of AI agents" in May, but enterprise customers aren't buying.
